comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Luisa Tetrazzini, Italian diva -- a coloratura soprano. One of her admirers, a chef, is said to have named Turkey Tetrazzini for her, just as Melba toast and Peach Melba were named for Nellie Melba, another popular opera singer of that era.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: it looks like she enjoyed many servings! her bio en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luisa_Tetrazzini amazingly, you can hear her for yourself through the magic of the internets! www.youtube.com/watch?v=1g0MmPZKE6Y

comment.author: 10118814@N07
comment._content: Oh, because she's fat. Ha! That's hilarious. Lololol.

comment.author: 14813052@N00
comment._content: Decades later Brenda Fricker would pay the ultimate homage to her as homeless bird lady in Home Alone 2: Lost In New York
